profile.title: Kōtaha Kaiwhakamahi
profile.mustLogin: Me takiuru koe kia tiro i ngā tautuhinga.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Whakaatu te taketake me te whakamāoritanga
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Whakaatu te taketake me te whakamāoritanga ki te taha
profile.saveError: Hapa: Kāore i taea te tiaki i ngā tautuhinga
profile.noPrivateKey: Kāore he kī tūmataiti i tēnei pūrere hei kaweake.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tautuhia he kupuhipa hei whakamuna i tō tārua:
profile.backupDownloaded: Kua tikiake te tārua kua whakamunatia.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Tāuruhia te kupuhipa mō tēnei tārua:
profile.importSuccess: Kua kawemai te kī tūmataiti ki tēnei pūrere.
profile.importFailed: I rahua te kawemai kī (kupuhipa hē, kōnae pakaru rānei).
profile.keysRotated: Kua waihangatia he takirua kī hou, kua tuku ake te kī tūmatanui.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kāore rawa tō kī tūmataiti e wehe atu i tēnei pūrere. Kaweakētia he kape kua tiakina ki te kupuhipa kia āhei ai te whakaora ki tētahi atu pūrere.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Kei te taumata Free koe — whai ake i ngā kōwhiringa Rā/Marama i raro iho. Whakamohoa kia huaki ai ngā kaupapa anō.
profile.backupDesc: Waihanga tārua kua tiakina ki te kupuhipa mō ō kī, ā, whakaorahia ki tētahi atu pūrere hei tūhono.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Kohukihukia ngā karere mā te taunoa
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Kohukihukia ina kāore te taupānga i te arotahi
profile.notifyOnCopy: Whakamōhiotia au mēnā ka tāruatia taku karere
profile.unfollowFailed: I rahua te whakamutua te aru
profile.followHint: Ka puta ā rātou kōrero ki tō whārangi E Aru Ana mēnā ka tuku rātou ki te hunga Aru (rānei Tūmatanui).
profile.followsYou: Kei te aru i a koe
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: I rahua te uta o te wāhanga
profile.sectionCrashedBody: I raru tētahi mea i tēnei wāhanga.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tukua mai ngā waea me ngā kupu kuputuhi ki tō waea, īmēra kua manatoko. Ka taea e ngā waea/kupu puta atu te whakaatu i tō tau Chatforia.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Tukua ngā kupu ki te waea
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Tukua ngā kupu ki te īmēra

chat.selectPrompt: Kōwhiria tētahi kuputuhi, rūma kōrerorero rānei hei tīmata
chat.emptySubtitle: Tukua he karere hei tīmata kōrerorero.

status.filesNote: Tae noa ki te 5 kōnae. Taunoa te 24 h te pau.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Takiuru kia whakatika i ō tautuhinga.

premium.heading: Kia Premium
premium.description: Wewete i ngā āhuatanga kaha & tango pānuitanga.

auth.headline: Karere haumaru, ao whānui me te whakamāoritanga inamata
auth.description: Whakamunatanga-mutunga-ki-te-mutunga, whakamāoritanga AI, karere ngaro-aunoa, me te waea reo/ataata.

feature.privacy: Tūmataitinga tuatahi. Ō raraunga, tō whakahaere.

auth.desktopTip: Kei te rorohiko papamahi? Matawai mā tō waea hei tiki taupānga.
auth.subhead: Karere tūmataiti, kua whakamunatia, ā, kua whakamāoritia — inamata.
auth.tip: Ka taea e koe te whakamahi i a Chatforia ki tētahi pūrere — ā, tikiake te taupānga mō te wheako pai rawa.
auth.scanHint: Matawai hei tiki taupānga, hei whakatuwhera rānei ki tō pūtirotiro.

home.title: Kāinga
home.subheader: Tukua he karere hei tīmata kōrerorero.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Tuhia he karere kia taea ai te tuku

press.title: Pāpāho
press.contact: Mō ngā pātai pāpāho, whakapā mai ki press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Mō ngā pātai pāpāho, whakapā mai ki press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: He karere haumaru a Chatforia me te whakamāoritanga inamata me te whakamunatanga E2E, kua hangaia kia māmā, kia tūmataiti hoki ngā kōrero ā-ao.
press.assetsText: Ngā tohu, ngā tairongoā, me ngā whakaahua hua (e haere ake nei).

careers.title: Ngā Tūranga Mahi
careers.intro: He rōpū iti mātou e hanga ana i tētahi karere tūmataiti, ā-ao. Ki te aro nui koe ki te whakamunatanga, te āheitanga, me te UX pai, koa tukuna mai he kōrero.
careers.openRoles: Ngā tūranga tuwhera: Pūhanga (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Hua, Tautoko.
careers.apply: Me pēhea te tono: Tukua mai tō rēhita/hononga ki jobs@chatforia.com.
careers.emailCta: Tukua tō rēhita mā te īmēra

about.title: Mō Chatforia
about.description: He karere haumaru, reo maha a Chatforia me te whakamunatanga mutunga-ki-te-mutunga, te whakamāoritanga inamata, me te waea reo/ataata. Ko tā mātou whāinga: kia hono ngā tāngata — me te haumaru, me te tūmataiti, puta noa i ngā reo.

values.access: Wāhi mō te katoa: Whakamāori aunoatia 100+ reo.
values.control: Mana whakahaere: He kōwhiringa ngā karere ngaro-aunoa & pānui-kua-taua.

about.howDescription: Ka whakamunatia ngā karere i tō pūrere i mua i tō wehenga. Kua hoahoatia te whakamāoritanga, ngā tārua, me te tūhono pūrere kia iti rawa ngā raraunga ka kitea e ā mātou tūmau.

advertise.title: Pānui ki Chatforia
advertise.description: Toro atu ki ngā kaiwhakamahi karere mātātoa mā ngā wāhi ataahua, haumaru-waitohu. He wāhi pānui pānapa, he tautoko, he whakatairanga ā-kāinga. Kāore ngā kaihoko Premium e kite pānuitanga.

adsense.withPubId: Kei te tuku pānui mā Google AdSense i tēnei wā. Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te ūnga mā Google Ads, whakamahia te ID kaiwhakaputa {{pubId}} ā, tonoa kia whakaritea ngā wāhanga i raro nei. Kei te wātea ngā kirimana tika — whakamahia te puka.
adsense.noPubId: Kei te tuku pānui mā Google AdSense i tēnei wā. Kei te wātea hoki ngā kirimana tika — whakamahia te puka i raro nei.

advertise.noPlacements: Kāore anō kia whakaritea he wāhi. Tāpiritia ki ads/placements.js.
advertise.whyHeader: He aha i kōwhiri ai i a Chatforia?

why.highSession: He nui te auautanga o ngā wātū me te roa o te noho ki te atanga kōrerorero
why.brandSafe: He hōputu haumaru-waitohu; he whāiti i te auautanga
why.sponsoredMoments: He wā tautoko kei te wātea (hei tauira, te kōpaki “Tīmata he Kōrerorero”)
why.deals: He kirimana tika, he mā te AdSense/Google Ads rānei

form.submittedMsg: Ngā mihi! Kei te haere tō pātai. Ka whai atu mātou ā tōna wā.
form.missingRequired: Whakakīa koa te ingoa, te īmēra, me te karere.
form.successToast: Ngā mihi! Ka whakapā atu mātou ākuanei.
form.mailtoInfo: Kei te huaki i tō kiritaki īmēra hei tuku i te pātai…

legal.disclaimerStart: Mā te tuku, ka whakaae koe ki ā mātou

upgrade.title: Whakamohoa
upgrade.subtitle: Kōwhiria te mahere tika māu: tangohia ngā pānui mā te Plus, rānei whiwhi i ngā āhuatanga kaha katoa mā te Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Ka mutu te ohaurunga
scheduleBanner.body: Ka hoki koe ki te Free i te

free.title: Free
free.ctaUnavailable: Huri ki te Free (kāore i te wātea)

features.ringtones: Ngā karanga me ngā oro karere ritenga

features.sameFeatures: Ngā āhuatanga ōrite ki te Marama

gettingStarted.title: Tīmata
gettingStarted.subtitle: He hōu koe ki Chatforia? Ka whakaatu tēnei aratohu tere i ngā mea matua kia whai hua koe i roto i ngā meneti ruarua.

alert.text: Ka tipu tēnei aratohu i a mātou e whakarewa ana i ngā āhuatanga hou. Mēnā he mea ngaro, whakamōhiotia mai mā

section2.title: 2) Tīmata te karere
section2.item1: Waihanga he DM, he Rōpū rānei, ā, tukuna tō karere tuatahi.
section2.item2: Whakamahia te whakamāoritanga inamata hei kōrero whiti i te 100+ reo.
section2.item3: Whakamātau i ngā karere ngaro-aunoa me ngā pānui-kua-taua i te Kōtaha → Tūmataiti.

section3.title: 3) Kōkiri atu
section3.item1Part1: Whakahaerehia tō mahere ki te whārangi
section3.item2Part1: Honoa ētahi atu pūrere ā, whakaritea ngā tārua kua whakamunatia i

account.q: Me pēhea taku waihanga, whakaora rānei i taku pūkete?
account.a: Tikiake te taupānga, whakamahia rānei te paetukutuku, pāwhiri “Waihanga pūkete”, manatoko i tō īmēra/waea. Hei whakaora, whakamahia “Kua wareware te kupuhipa”.

privacy.a: Āe. Kua whakamunatia ngā karere me ngā waea hei taunoa. Ko koe anake me te kaiwhiwhi ka taea te pānui.

translate.q: Me pēhea te mahi o te whakamāoritanga inamata?
translate.a: Whakahohea te “Whakamāori-aunoatia” i Tautuhinga → Āhua & Reo. Ka whakamāoritia ki te pūrere ina taea, ki ētahi API haumaru rānei me te iti o ngā raraunga.

contact.a: Tukua mai ki support@chatforia.com. Tāpirihia he mata whakaahua me tō putanga taupānga.

contact.title: Whakapā Mai
contact.successMsg: Ngā mihi — mā te īmēra e whakahoki kōrero tō mātou rōpū.
contact.errorSend: Kāore i taea te tuku. Tēnā koa īmēra atu ki support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: E whakamārama ana tēnei Kaupapahere Tūmataiti me pēhea a Chatforia (“mātou”) e kohikohi, e whakamahi, e tiri pārongo ana i a koe e whakamahi ana i ā mātou taupānga me ngā ratonga. Ka hoahoa mātou i a Chatforia kia iti rawa ngā raraunga ka taea e mātou te kite.

infoWeCollect.title: Ngā pārongo ka kohia e mātou
infoWeCollect.account: Pārongo pūkete (pēnei i te īmēra/waea) hei waihanga, hei haumaru i tō pūkete.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ko ngā ihirangi kua whakamunatia (ngā karere/waea) he E2E; kāore mātou e taea te pānui.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Raraunga ā-hapa/ā-whakamahi pērā i ngā rīpoata tukinga, momo pūrere, tātaritanga māmā hei whakapai mahi.

howWeUse.title: Me pēhea mātou e whakamahi ai
howWeUse.provide: Hei tuku me te whakamana i te ratonga (takiuru, kite kōpāpā/whanako).
howWeUse.legal: Hei ū ki ngā here ture.

sharing.title: Tiritiri
sharing.body: Kāore mātou e hoko raraunga whaiaro. Tērā pea ka tiritiri mātou i ētahi raraunga iti ki ngā kaiwhakahaere (pānui pana, tātaritanga) i raro i ngā kirimana kaha.

rights.title: Ō motika
rights.body: E ai ki tō rohe (pērā i te GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ka āhei koe ki te tono uru, whakatika, muku, rānei te aukati i ētahi tukatuka. Whakapā: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Purenga raraunga & haumarutanga
retention.body: Ka puritia e mātou ko ngā mea e hiahiatia ana anake hei whakahaere i te ratonga, ā, ka whakamahi i ngā paerewa haumarutanga. Kāore e taea e mātou te wetemunatia ngā ihirangi E2E.

children.title: Tamariki
children.body: Ehara a Chatforia mā ngā tamariki i raro i te 13 tau (rānei kia rite ki tō ture ā-rohe).

changes.title: Ngā rerekētanga
changes.body: Ka whakaputaina ngā whakahōunga ki konei, ka whakarerekē hoki i te rā “Whakahoutanga whakamutunga”.

intro.body: Mā te whakamahi i a Chatforia ka whakaae koe ki ēnei Ture. Ki te kore koe e whakaae, kaua e whakamahi i te ratonga.

accounts.title: Ngā pūkete
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Hoatu pārongo tika, ā, puritia kia haumaru ō tāurutanga.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Ko koe te kawenga mō ngā mahi i tō pūkete.

acceptableUse.title: Whakamahi tika
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Kaua e tuku ihirangi ture-kore, tūkino, takahi; kaua e tuku para, tukino aunoa rānei.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Tērā pea ka whakatārewatia/ka whakamutua mō ngā takahitanga.

yourContent.title: Āu ihirangi
yourContent.body: Ka mau tonu ō motika ki āu ihirangi. Ka tukuna mai e koe ngā motika e hiahiatia ana kia rere ai te ratonga (pērā i te tuku, te rokiroki, te whakamāori).

disclaimer.title: Whakakāhore & haepapa
disclaimer.body: Ka tukuna te ratonga “me te āhua nei” kāore he taunaki. I runga i te ture, kāore a Chatforia e haepapa mō ngā parekura kāore i te tika, i te whānui rānei.

changes.title: Ngā rerekētanga
changes.body: Ka whakahōungia e mātou ēnei ture; mā te whakamahi tonu i muri i ngā rerekētanga ka whakaae koe.

doNotSell.title: Kaua e Hoko, e Tiri rānei Aku Pārongo Whaiaro
doNotSell.body: Kāore a Chatforia e hoko pārongo whaiaro. Ka āhei tonu ngā kainoho o California ki te tuku tono i raro i te CPRA mā te pātene i raro nei.

cookies.title: Tautuhinga Pihikete
cookies.body: He iti noa ngā pihikete a Chatforia (hei tauira, wātū, haumarutanga). Kāore mātou e whakamahi pihikete pānuitanga a-tuatoru. Whakahaerehia ngā pihikete mā ngā tautuhinga o tō pūtirotiro.
